channel.title: Maybe you can help with one of these several problems? 5+ Problems
channel.description:
:o I am sorry I know very little about this but maybe you can help me learn.
Problems: 1. In my client it shows NPC's it has coded into it. I typed one of the NPC's into my Autospawn.cfg and it came up in game as a tree?
2. When players die they go to the old "Home" not the new one I had made.
3. I've used a source that you could go up to level 127. How do I do that?
4. How do I add items to a client?
5. What does "Declare" mean? Someone made a tutorial that told me to "Declare" I was just wondering.
6. If I made an item and It only worked in my client. What would it be in other clients?
7. How do I change the outside of my client. The chatbox and all of that.

item.title: Maybe you can help with one of these several problems? 5+ Problems
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I know you do, but I’m not spoon feeding all of them. Maybe one or two, But I’m busy. I’ll PM you my MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: Maybe you can help with one of these several problems? 5+ Problems
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

  1. Add the models, silabs client has the models added thats why.
  2. Look for the old home coords in the dying boolean. I think public boolean applydead
  3. Edit the combat level formula
  4. Add models and ints in class8.java
  5. Declare, like define, make the int basically
  6. It would be some weird object, like a tree
  7. Sprites folder

Read full topic

  1. In my client it shows NPC’s it has coded into it. I typed one of the NPC’s into my Autospawn.cfg and it came up in game as a tree?
